europeana:record.dc:title: On five species of Phyllogomphoides Belle, 1970, from Brazil with the descriptions of three new taxa (Odonata: Gomphidae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Belle J.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Gomphidae; Phyllogomphoides; new species; Brazil
europeana:record.dc:description: The new species Phyllogomphoides spiniventris spec. nov., P. suspectus spec. nov. and P. pseudangularis spec. nov. are described and illustrated. The male of P. calverti is discussed and figured. The hitherto unknown male of P. praedatrix is described. A key to the South-American species of Phyllogomphoides is added.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: On five species of Phyllogomphoides Belle, 1970, from Brazil with the descriptions of three new taxa (Odonata: Gomphidae) (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 68) (Issue 8)
